response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize your [industry/operation]. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features and high-quality materials. Considering its potential impact on your business, I believe it could be an invaluable asset. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to make your decision promptly. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to potentially enhancing your operations with our product.", "product_price": 11000}
